TextFlow.p: Currently following transactions are available in the left menu. This menu is basically is used to start a new transaction like quoting.
Use left menu to create a new Personal Auto quote.
Place to check quotes/policies that are in process. Users can view, edit, clone and search depending upon their permissions and level of access.
Place to check policies. Users can view, endorse and search policies depending upon their permissions and level of access.
Place to do admin activities. This menu option is not available for everyone. Access can be restricted to group level using admin screen.
Place to check day to day application error. This menu option is not available for everyone. Access can be restricted to group level using admin screen.
